Package digital.ivan.lightchain.core.chain.impl

Class AgentRoutedFuncChain

java.lang.Object
digital.ivan.lightchain.core.chain.impl.AgentRoutedFuncChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISyncChain<ToolCall,LLMInputFunc>
public class AgentRoutedFuncChain extends Object implements ISyncChain<ToolCall,LLMInputFunc>
Represents a processing chain that handles agent routing functionality using a language learning model (LLM). The AgentRoutedFuncChain is designed to generate a ToolCall based on a function-specific LLM input.

It follows the "chain of responsibility" pattern where it processes and generates output based on the provided LLM and the input. This class builds upon the SystemMessagePropmtTemplate to provide a system message context for the agent.

The primary interaction method is run(LLMInputFunc, Logger), which consumes a function-specific LLM input and an optional logger. This method generates a ToolCall which indicates the tool and its associated action.

Errors and exceptions in the LLM output generation are wrapped into OutputProcessingException for clarity.

Author:
Ivan Potapov
